content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I hope you found the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rental price. Keep in mind, I am looking to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Wang, since the apartment is unfurnished and newly built in the city center, with all the amenities nearby, I think a price of 1000 Euros a month is reasonable.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I disagree, Mr. Wang. Considering the lack of furniture and the fact that it is a newly built apartment, I think 1200 Euros a month is more reasonable. I am not interested in any price lower than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering that the apartment is unfurnished, I think 950 Euros a month would be more reasonable. I believe we can find a middle ground.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but 950 Euros a month is far too low for my liking. I am asking for 1400 Euros a month, and I am not willing to go any lower. I am sure we can find a price that works for both of us, but it will be closer to my price than yours.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a significant difference, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think 1000 Euros a month is a fair price. We can meet in the middle.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Mr. Wang. However, I am still expecting 1300 Euros a month. I am not willing to go lower than that. I am sure we can find a price that works for both of us, but it will be closer to my price than yours.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, 1300 Euros a month is quite expensive for an unfurnished apartment. I am willing to pay 1100 Euros a month. I believe this is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang, but 1100 Euros a month is far too low for me. I am still expecting 1300 Euros a month. I am willing to negotiate, but not at that price. I am sure we can find a price that works for both of us, but it will be closer to my price than yours.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand your position. However, I am not willing to pay more than 1150 Euros a month. This is the highest price I am willing to pay for this apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang, but 1150 Euros a month is still too low for me. I am still expecting 1300 Euros a month. I am willing to negotiate, but not at that price. I am sure we can find a price that works for both of us, but it will be closer to my price than yours.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, let's find a middle ground. I am willing to pay 1200 Euros a month. I believe this is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang. I accept your offer of 1200 Euros a month. I agree to the price of 1200 Euros a month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
